name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Mahogany Wood Seat

reviews.name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Mahogany Wood Seat
reviews.reviewText: None of my full-figure friends broke any welds like the other set of chairs I bought for around my kitchen table (they lasted two visits from my friends). Hopefully these will last without crush injuries from big butts. I placed cushions on them that were shaped like the wooden seat and they looked great and were comfortable. Got lots of positive compliments about these chairs after the meal. Don't recommend the other chairs I bought to anyone. They have the scroll design. But these work well for now. Stay tuned:)
reviews.title: Good for heavy people

reviews.name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Mahogany Wood Seat
reviews.reviewText: The new dining chairs were delivered to my house in record time with no shipping damage. I was considering 5 or 6 different models. The x back design is perfect and heavy duty. These two chairs should last me a lifetime. All i need now is cushions and plus i am building a new solid pine dining table.
reviews.title: X back cafe style chairs

reviews.name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Mahogany Wood Seat
reviews.reviewText: These chairs are well built and are great looking. Goes well with our white table. They look like they came as part of the set.We are going to put some removable cushions for our tushies. Other than that they are perfect for us. They are easy to clean up. I recommend these to anyone with kids or cats that seem to spend more time on the chairs than mom or dad.
reviews.title: Great chairs for kitchen or dining room.

reviews.name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Mahogany Wood Seat
reviews.reviewText: Very heavy and good chair. Love it.
reviews.title: Excellent Price and quality

reviews.name: X-Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Mahogany Wood Seat
reviews.reviewText: Comes fully assembled except that you have to attach the seats to the chairs. The screws are provided but, weirdly, you have to drill your own holes into the wood.
reviews.title: Great value
